name: Code Orange
description:
CODE ORANGE

------------------------------

Code Orange is a game about a robot becoming self aware and running away from his evil maker, but there's a twist, the factory.....IS ENDLESS!!!!

------------------------------

Try and get the highest score!

|||| LEAVE COMMENTS DOWN BELOW WITH YOUR HIGHSCORE AND THE HIGHEST 3 SCORES WILL BE UPDATED ON THIS PAGE! ||||
